text: Shanti Bhushan (born 11 November 1925) is an Indian politician. He was Minister of Law and Justice from 1977 to 1979 in the Morarji Desai Ministry. He is a senior advocate of the Supreme Court of India. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:Living people Category:Indian lawyers Category:Politicians from Uttar Pradesh
title: Shanti Bhushan
